sentences.english: Will it greeting be courteous or rough?
sentences.chinese: 它的問候是謙恭仰或粗魯？

sentences.english: While dealing with a stranger, common courtesy you use.
sentences.chinese: 當對待一個陌生人的時候你謙恭有禮。

sentences.english: Maidens should (or must) be mild and meek, ft to hear and slow to speak.
sentences.chinese: 少女應溫良謙恭，敏於聽而慎於言。

sentences.english: "And I, " returns the sky, "your humble touch. "
sentences.chinese: “而我，”天空答道，“傾慕你的謙恭宛轉。”

sentences.english: I humbly apologize for what happened tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我謙恭地爲昨晚發生的事情道歉。

sentences.english: She had a natural courtesy combined with an unshakable conviction.
sentences.chinese: 她既有天生的謙恭有禮的舉止，又有堅定不移的信念。

sentences.english: In the course of the trail, the millionaire showed his courtesy properly.
sentences.chinese: 在審判期間，百萬富翁恰當地展示了他的謙恭有禮。

sentences.english: The thanks, the humility, the gratitude, the surprise of Mrs. Quiverful had been very overpowering.
sentences.chinese: 奎瓦富太太的謙恭，驚訝與千恩萬謝實在叫人受不了。

sentences.english: Usually, he took plain carriage with fewer attendants and wore plain clothes. His behavior became polite and modest.
sentences.chinese: 平時輕車簡從，穿着樸素，對人一貫保持謙恭有禮。
他謙恭地同我們打了招呼。

sentences.english: The man, though poor, showed an inbred courtesy .
sentences.chinese: 那人雖窮，卻表現出天生的謙恭有禮。

sentences.english: The mark of a true hero is humility.
Maidens must be mild and meek, swift to hear and slow to speak.
sentences.chinese: 少女應溫良謙恭，敏於聽而慎於言。
他一邊向後退，一邊鞠着躬，真是一種諷刺的謙恭。

definition: receptive as an echoing canyon (idiom); modest and open-minded
to be of service to others/to help others/benevolent
to be content with what one is
to have a sense of shame
see 念念不忘[nian4 nian4 bu4 wang4]
